import {useState} from 'react' let initialize = (size, max) => [...new Array(size)].map(() => 0) const barStyle = { position: 'absolute' } const Content = props => { let {Component,selection, state,asset, style, onUpdate} = props let [colas, setColas] = useState(initialize(20, 50)) let [colaz, setColaz] = useState(initialize(20,100)) console.log(colas, colaz) return

Here we proof that the Collatz conjecture is true

} export {Content}
